title.description: Used as a replacement name when displaying the name.

rarity.description: The weapon's rarity. Affects background and star count.

weapon.description: The 'weapon' item group used for ascension. Check items for what items can be used.

common.description: The 'common' item group used for ascension and talents. Check items for what items can be used.

elite.description: The 'elite' item group used for ascension and talents. Check items for what items can be used.

icons.description: An array of strings to attach to the end of the icon when being created.

source.description: How the weapon is/was obtained. When this is set to 'event', the weapon is declared to be 'limited'.

canRefine.description: Bool if the weapon can be refined. Does not have an effect on weapons with a rarity of 2 or less.
